Core.desc: General commands for configuration, info, and diagnostics.

Moderation.desc: Moderation tools, case edits, channel controls, and cleanup.

help.brief: Show help for commands or categories.
help.desc: Displays an overview of categories, or detailed info for a given category/command.

subcommands.name: overview
subcommands.brief: List all categories and their commands.

subcommands.name: category
subcommands.brief: Show commands in a category with short descriptions.

subcommands.name: command
subcommands.brief: Show usage, aliases, and details for a command.

helpui.desc: Opens a dropdown UI to browse categories → commands → example usages.

helprefresh.desc: Reloads the local help_descriptions.json without restarting the bot (Manage Server required).

ping.desc: Shows the current WebSocket latency in milliseconds.

uptime.brief: Show how long the bot has been online.
uptime.desc: Displays the time elapsed since the last restart.

invite.desc: Sends a button with the OAuth2 invite URL using Administrator permissions.

about.desc: Shows overview, version, developer, library versions, and quick stats.

stats.desc: Shows guilds, members, channels, commands loaded, latency, uptime, and CPU/RAM (if available).

prefix.brief: View or change the server prefix.
prefix.desc: Shows the current prefix or sets a new one (requires Manage Server to modify).

subcommands.name: set
subcommands.brief: Set a new prefix (≤ 5 chars, no spaces).

feedback.desc: Delivers your suggestion/feedback to the configured channel or the app owner.

bug.brief: Report a bug to the developer.
bug.desc: Sends a bug report to the configured channel or the app owner.
usage: {p}bug Duration didn’t update the actual timeout.

modlog.brief: Set or view the moderation log channel.
modlog.desc: Stores the channel where case embeds are posted (per-guild setting).

warn.brief: Warn a user and log the case.
warn.desc: Issues a warning, DMs the user, and logs the case in the mod-log channel.

warns.desc: Shows all stored warnings for the user (per-guild).

clearwarns.brief: Clear all warnings for a user.
clearwarns.desc: Deletes the warning history for the specified user.

kick.desc: Kicks the member, DMs them the reason (if possible), and logs the case.

ban.desc: Bans the member, optionally deleting up to 7 days of their messages.

unban.brief: Unban a user by ID or tag.
unban.desc: Removes a ban using the user’s ID or username#discriminator.

mute.desc: Applies a Discord timeout for a duration. Examples: 10s, 5m, 1h, 2d.

unmute.desc: Clears an active timeout from a member.

timeout.desc: Applies a timeout or updates an existing one. Accepts time units: s, m, h, d.

reason.desc: Edits the reason text for a logged case and updates the stored record.

duration.desc: Changes the duration of a previously timed-out member and updates the live timeout.

purge.desc: Deletes messages using rich filters (skips pinned, excludes the command invocation, and posts a summary). Max recommended 1000.

subcommands.name: user
subcommands.brief: Delete messages from a specific user.

subcommands.name: startswith
subcommands.brief: Delete messages that start with text.

subcommands.name: endswith
subcommands.brief: Delete messages that end with text.

subcommands.name: invites
subcommands.brief: Delete messages that contain invite links.

subcommands.name: images
subcommands.brief: Delete messages that contain image attachments.

subcommands.name: text
subcommands.brief: Delete messages that contain text (non-attachments only).

clean.desc: Erases Helix’s messages and command invocations in the channel. Your implementation auto-detects the current prefix.

lock.desc: Temporarily prevents sending messages in a channel until unlocked.

unlock.desc: Restores send-message permissions for @everyone in the channel.

slowmode.desc: Sets a cooldown (seconds) between messages. Use 'off' to disable.

gif.brief: Send a random GIF matching your query.
gif.desc: Searches a GIF provider and returns a relevant random GIF.
